Package com.telenav.kivakit.resource.spi

Class ResourceResolverService

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.resource.spi.ResourceResolverService
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject
public class ResourceResolverService extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
Not public API

Resolves ResourceIdentifiers into Resources. This is the service provider interface for resource resolution. For the user API, see Resource.resolveResource(Listener, String), Resource.resolveResource(Listener, ResourceIdentifier), and Resource.resolveResource(Listener, ResourcePath).

The method resolveResource(ResourceIdentifier) iterates through implementations of the ResourceResolver interface located by Java's ServiceLoader, until a resolver is found that can accept the identifier, as determined by ResourceResolver.accepts(ResourceIdentifier). This resolver is then used to resolve the resource with ResourceResolver.resolve(ResourceIdentifier).

Access

  • resourceResolverService()

Resolution

  • resolveResource(ResourceIdentifier)
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

  • Method Details

    • resourceResolverService

      public static ResourceResolverService resourceResolverService()
      Returns an instance of this class

    • resolveResource

      public Resource resolveResource(@NotNull @NotNull ResourceIdentifier identifier)
      Resolves the given ResourceIdentifier to a Resource by using ServiceLoader to locate ResourceResolvers. The method ResourceResolver.accepts(ResourceIdentifier) is called on each resolver until a resolver is found that can accept the identifier. Then this resolver is used to resolve the identifier into a resource.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The resource identifier to resolve
      Returns:
      The resolved resource
